name: S.R. Abrasives Tools
overview:
Established in the year 2007, we, “S.R. Abrasives Tools”, an ISO 9001:2008 Certified company are engaged in manufacturing and supplying a wide range of Grinding Wheels. In our range, we offer Resinoid Bonded Straight Wheel, Resinoid Bonded Depressed Centered Wheel, Bearing Grinding Wheel, Centerless Grinding Wheel and Depressed Center Wheel. Furthermore, we offer Straight Wheel, Resinoid Bonded Cut Off Wheel, Cut Off Wheel and Resinoid Bonded Cut Off Wheel, among others.

Our Team: We have a well-managed team, which comprises highly experienced and expert professionals. In our team, we have production experts, engineers, quality controllers and warehousing & packaging personnel. These professionals have been selected after strict assessment of skills and knowledge. They work in close coordination with each other to meet our customers’ requirements. Furthermore, our team members are well-acquainted with the latest technology and machinery required for carrying out various business activities in an efficient manner.

Our Quality: We are a quality-oriented organization known for consistently delivering defect-free range of grinding wheels. Our qualitative products have helped us become the trusted choice of clients. We make sure to maintain quality in all our business operations. Right from the time of procurement of raw material to the supply of finished products, we strictly follow TQM policies. Quality controllers of our firm duly check the finished grinding wheels on several parameters prior to their dispatch to the market.

Our Infrastructure: Our infrastructure facility is highly advanced and sprawls across a huge area. We have segregated our infrastructure into various departments to efficiently handle activities like procurement, manufacturing, quality, administration, R&D, warehousing, customer support and others. Manufacturing unit of our firm has a large production capacity, and helps us fulfill bulk orders.

Our Products: Resinoid Bonded Straight Wheel, Resinoid Bonded Depressed Centered Wheel, Bearing Grinding Wheel, Centerless Grinding Wheel and Depressed Center Wheel. Furthermore, we offer Straight Wheel, Resinoid Bonded Cut Off Wheel, Cut Off Wheel and Resinoid Bonded Cut Off Wheel, among others.
